name: Nightmare Pursuit
storyline:
In Nightmare Pursuit, the darkness hides more than just monsters—it conceals a powerful and mysterious entity that thrives on fear and chaos. Each of the killers—whether it's the Enchantress, the Farmer, or the Ringmaster—has struck a sinister deal with this entity. In exchange for power, they’ve surrendered their humanity and now serve as its agents of terror, forever trapped in a cycle of violence and death.

Bound by their pact, these killers are driven by an insatiable urge to hunt, torment, and kill anyone who dares enter their domain. But their motives are shrouded in secrecy, with the entity pulling the strings, orchestrating a never-ending nightmare. Survivors must not only escape the killers but also unravel the dark mystery of the entity’s true intentions—before they too become part of the game.
summary: Nightmare Pursuit is an intense multiplayer horror game where survivors must avoid the deadly traps and unique abilities of terrifying killers. Rely on stealth, strategy, and teamwork to survive in horrific environments. Experience the thrill of the chase—escape or become the hunted.
